### indicatePessimisticFixpoint() {#a93339349de364716175a03098d94d44f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ChangeStatus anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AAMemoryLocationImpl::indicatePessimisticFixpoint ()</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Indicate that the abstract state should converge to the pessimistic state.

This will usually revert the optimistically assumed state to the known to be true state.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
ChangeStatus::CHANGED as the assumed value may change.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l08501">8501</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
